items.sentence: Tom found the wallet he thought he'd lost after searching the house from top to bottom.
I've lost interest in studying, so I don't think there's any point in going to college.
Tom and Mary aren't planning to go to Australia. They're planning to go to New Zealand.
The clouds are getting darker and darker and it's beginning to look like it might rain.
Just because you think it's a good idea doesn't mean that the rest of us think so, too.
Tom wakes up every three hours during the night, while Mary sleeps all the way through.
The twins look so much alike it's next to impossible to distinguish one from the other.
The girl said she was going shopping with her mother, and didn't listen to what I said.
I used the new corkscrew that Tom gave me to open the bottle of wine that Mary gave me.
Tom started to answer the question and then realized that it was a rhetorical question.
